Uses of Interface
io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.State

Packages that use State
Package
Description
io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour
Behaviour models for the agent-based simulator.
io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy
Policy models for outbreak-level interventions and control strategies.
io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics
Core mechanics and infrastructure for agent-based modeling operations.

  • Uses of State in io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour

    Subinterfaces of State in io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    BehaviourModel
    Called during an update cycle before any changes have been made This means any references to state refers to current state, but any references to history refer to the previous state.
    Classes in io.github.ai4ci.abm.behaviour that implement State
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    enum 
    LockdownIsolation
    A behaviour model that works with ReactiveLockdown, implementing policy changes by allowing people to enter a low activity state.
    enum 
    NonCompliant
    Non compliant behaviour model.
    enum 
    ReactiveTestAndIsolate
    Reactive test and isolate behaviour model.
    enum 
    SmartAgentLFTTesting
    A behaviour model for people who will test reactively with LFTs, and then reflexively with PCRs.
    enum 
    SmartAgentTesting
    Smart agent testing behaviour model.
    enum 
    Symptomatic
    A behaviour model for people who are symptomatic.
    enum 
    Test
    A test behaviour model that does nothing.

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    PolicyModel
    Called during an update cycle before any changes have been made This means any references to state refers to current state, but any references to history refer to the previous state.
    Classes in io.github.ai4ci.abm.policy that implement State
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    enum 
    NoControl
    A no operation policy model where no central control is applied to the outbreak.
    enum 
    ReactiveLockdown
    A reactive lockdown policy implementation that triggers population-wide interventions based on epidemiological thresholds.

  • Uses of State in io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics

    Classes in io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics with type parameters of type State
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    State<BUILDER,HISTORY,STATE,X extends State<BUILDER,HISTORY,STATE,X>>
    This abstraction lets us have policy and behaviour models sharing the same state model framework, so outbreak and person updates can follow the same pattern.
    Subinterfaces of State in io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    State.BehaviourState
    Marks a state model as being a component of a behaviour relevant to people within the simulation
    static interface 
    State.PolicyState
    Marks a state model state as being a component of a policy for managing to the outbreak simulation as a whole
    static interface 
    StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting
    Interface for behavior states that require no testing or history updates.
    static interface 
    StateUtils.DoesPCRIfSymptomatic
    Interface for behavior states that perform PCR testing when symptomatic.
